mapper.insert: insert into article (articleid, articletype, articlestatus, title, content, cost, createtime,lastmodifytime,authorid,categoryid,rootid) values(#{questionid}, 302, #{questionstatus}, #{questiontitle}, #{questioncontent}, #{cost}, now(),now(),#{authorid},null,null)
mapper.select: select content questioncontent, title questiontitle, cost cost, articlestatus questionstatus, createtime createtime, lastmodifytime lastmodifytime, categoryid categoryid, rootid rootid from article where articleid = #{questionid} and articletype = 302
mapper.delete: delete from article WHERE articleid = #{questiontitle} AND articletype = 302
delete from article_has_tag where articleid=#{questionid} and tagid=#{tagid}
